info.title: Swaps API
info.description:
The Swaps API provides instant cross-chain swap and bridge functionality for decentralized applications.
It supports multiple virtual machines (EVM, Solana, Bitcoin) and various DEX protocols and bridge solutions.

get.description: Generates a transaction for cross-chain swaps, bridges, and calls. The action includes transaction data, routing information, and fee calculations for executing the requested operation.

parameters.name: actionType
parameters.description: Type of action to perform

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: The address of the sender/user

parameters.name: srcChainId
parameters.description: Source chain ID

parameters.name: srcToken
parameters.description: Source token address

parameters.name: dstChainId
parameters.description: Destination chain ID

parameters.name: dstToken
parameters.description: Destination token address

parameters.name: slippage
parameters.description: Slippage tolerance in bps

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description:
The exact in or exact out amount of the swap

**Required:** for `swap-action`

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

parameters.name: swapDirection
parameters.description:
Swap direction for the action

**Required:** for `swap-action`

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type (use `exact-amount-in`)

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description:
Address to receive the swapped tokens

**Optional:** for `swap-action`

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type (should be the proxy wallet address)

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
The EVM address of the target contract (20 bytes hex)

**Required:** for `evm-calldata-tx` action type

parameters.name: data
parameters.description:
Calldata for the transaction

**Required:** for `evm-calldata-tx` action type

parameters.name: value
parameters.description:
Value to send with transaction

**Optional:** for `evm-calldata-tx` action type

parameters.name: erc20Amount
parameters.description:
The amount of Erc20 being transferred

**Optional:** for `evm-calldata-tx` action type (use for calls requiring Erc20 transfers)

parameters.name: erc20Spender
parameters.description:
The Erc20 spender requiring approval for the transaction call

**Optional:** for `evm-calldata-tx` action type (will default to the `to` address)

parameters.name: bridgeIds
parameters.description:
Specific bridge protocols to use

**Optional:** Will default to all available protocols

parameters.name: refundTo
parameters.description:
Alternate address to receive refunds

**Optional:** Will default to the `sender`

parameters.name: returnDepositAddress
parameters.description:
Return a deposit address for deposit-based flows

**Optional:** Set to `true` to receive a deposit address in the response

parameters.name: appFees
parameters.description:
Application fees configuration as JSON array

**Optional:** Will default to fees configured for the application

 **Example:** `[{ "bps": 50, "receiverAddress": "0x..." }]`

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description:
Polymarket user ID - returned from `POST /create`

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

parameters.name: side
parameters.description:
Order side for Polymarket orders

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

parameters.name: tokenID
parameters.description:
Polymarket CLOB token ID

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

parameters.name: orderType
parameters.description:
Polymarket order type

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

- `FOK`: Fill or Kill (market order)
- `FAK`: Fill and Kill (market order)

parameters.name: feeRateBps
parameters.description:
Fee rate in basis points (non-negative)

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

parameters.name: tickSize
parameters.description:
Price tick size for Polymarket orders

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

parameters.name: negRisk
parameters.description:
Negative risk flag for Polymarket

**Required:** for `polymarket` action type

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

error.name: AmountTooHighError
error.message: The specified amount is too high.
error.title: Amount too high

error.name: AmountTooLowError
error.message: The specified amount is too low.
error.title: Amount too low

error.name: CrossVmReceiverRequiredError
error.message: Receiver address is required for swaps across different VMs.
error.title: Receiver address required

error.name: ExcessiveFeeError
error.message: The inputted flat fee is too large (over 50% of tx input).
error.title: Excessive fee

error.name: InsufficientLiquidityError
error.message: There is insufficient liquidity to complete this transaction.
error.title: Insufficient liquidity

error.name: InvalidAddressError
error.message: The format of the specified address is invalid.
error.title: Invalid address format

error.name: InvalidAmountZeroError
error.message: Amount must be greater than zero.
error.title: Zero amount not allowed

error.name: InvalidDstTokenError
error.message: Destination token is required.
error.title: Invalid destination token

error.name: InvalidParameterError
error.message: The request contains an invalid parameter.
error.title: Invalid parameter

details.reason: Slippage must be between 0 and 10000 bps

error.name: InvalidSrcTokenError
error.message: Source token is required.
error.title: Invalid source token

error.name: MissingRequiredFieldError
error.message: The request is missing a required field.
error.title: Missing required field

details.context: Source token address is required for swap actions

error.name: NoAvailableRouteError
error.message: No route is available for the specified parameters.
error.title: No available route

error.name: UnsupportedNetworkError
error.message: The network with the specified chainId is not supported.
error.title: Unsupported network

error.name: UnsupportedNetworkPairError
error.message: Routing between the specified networks is not supported.
error.title: Unsupported network pair

error.name: UnsupportedNetworkAndTokenPairError
error.message: Routing between the specified tokens and networks is not supported.
error.title: Unsupported network and token pair

error.name: UnsupportedSwapDirectionError
error.message: The specified swap direction is not supported.
error.title: Unsupported swap direction

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

error.name: InvalidApiKeyError
error.message: The provided API key is invalid.
error.title: Invalid API key

error.name: MissingApiKeyError
error.message: API key is required.
error.title: Missing API key

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied due to restrictions

error.name: GeoBlockingError
error.message: Access denied due to geo-blocking restrictions.
error.title: Geo-blocking restriction

details.reason: Country is on the blocked list

error.name: WalletScreeningError
error.message: Access denied due to wallet screening restrictions.
error.title: Wallet screening restriction

error.name: MethodNotAllowedError
error.message: The HTTP request method specified is not allowed.
error.title: Method not allowed

error.name: InternalServerError
error.message: An internal server error occurred while processing the request.
error.title: Internal Server Error

post.description: Register transactions for indexing. Mandatory for non EVM transactions.

get.description: Retrieve the status and details of a transaction by transaction ID.

parameters.name: txHash
parameters.description: Transaction hash to query (required if txId not provided)

parameters.name: txId
parameters.description: Transaction ID to query (required if txHash not provided)

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Source chain ID for the transaction (optional but recommended)

get.description: Retrieve paginated transaction history with optional filtering.

parameters.name: appIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of your app IDs. By default, a request to this endpoint will return transactions across all appIds in your org. Each API key has a unique app ID.  Multiple app IDs can exist within a single org ID.

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Wallet address to filter transactions by user

parameters.name: chainIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of chain IDs to filter by

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page (max 500)

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Time period filter

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date filter (Unix timestamp)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date filter (Unix timestamp)

get.description: Retrieves all available token paths across supported chains with configurable filtering options. Itâ€™s recommended to call this endpoint after selecting the source and destination tokens to validate route eligibility.

parameters.name: srcChainId
parameters.description: Source chain ID

parameters.name: srcToken
parameters.description: Source token address

parameters.name: dstChainId
parameters.description: Recommended: destination chain ID

parameters.name: dstToken
parameters.description: Recommended: destination token address

parameters.name: excludeBridgeIds
parameters.description: Bridge IDs to exclude from routing

parameters.name: excludeDexIds
parameters.description: DEX IDs to exclude from routing

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

get.description: Retrieve a list of supported chains, their names, and virtual machine identifiers. Raw data for the [supported chains list](/resources/chain-list).

post.description: Creates a new Swaps account for a user or fetches an existing one based on the provided EVM address.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves the status of a workflow transaction by transaction ID.

parameters.name: txId
parameters.description: Transaction ID from /getAction request

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

post.description:
Redeems position from a resolved Polymarket market. For positions with a current value > 0, this endpoint allows users to claim their winnings from a specific market condition. For losing positions with a current value = 0, this endpoint allows users to burn their position tokens to clean up their account. 
 Endpoint awaits successful execution of the redemption transaction before returning the transaction hash.

conditionId.description: Polymarket condition ID for the position to redeem

assetId.description: Polymarket asset ID for the asset to redeem

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Merges a full set of position tokens back into collateral by burning them. Can be used to claim winnings from resolved markets or clean up positions. Endpoint awaits successful execution of the merge transaction before returning the transaction hash.

conditionId.description: Polymarket condition ID for the position to redeem

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Sells an existing position in a Polymarket market. This endpoint allows users to exit their positions by selling their outcome tokens using market orders (FOK/FAK).

tokenID.description: Polymarket CLOB token ID of the position to sell

orderType.description: Order type - Fill-Or-Kill (FOK) or Fill-And-Kill (FAK) for market orders

tickSize.description: Tick size from the market details (e.g., '0.01')

negRisk.description: Negative risk flag from the market details

amount.description: Amount of tokens to sell (must be a positive number)

feeRateBps.description: Fee rate in basis points (optional, defaults to 0)

slippage.description: Slippage tolerance in basis points (optional, defaults to 0)

success.description: Whether the sell order was successful

errorMsg.description: Error message if the order failed (empty string if successful)

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

amountIn.description: Expected amount to input (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountInMax.description: Maximum amount to input (inclusive of slippage)

amountOut.description: Expected amount delivered to users (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountOutMin.description: Minimum amount delivered to users (inclusive of slippage)

bridgeIds.description: Bridge IDs used in the route.

bridgeRoute.description: Bridge route information (src chain + token, dst chain + token, BridgeId)

requiresTokenApproval.description: Flag indicating whether the transaction object requires a source token approval check.

requiresRegisterTransaction.description: Flag indicating whether the transaction requires registration via the registerTxs endpoint. Mandatory for non-EVM transactions.

allRoutes.description: All available routes for the action.

amountIn.description: Expected amount to input (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountInMax.description: Maximum amount to input (inclusive of slippage)

amountOut.description: Expected amount delivered to users (exclusive of slippage - recommended value to display in frontend)

amountOutMin.description: Minimum amount delivered to users (inclusive of slippage)

bridgeIds.description: Bridge IDs used in the route.

bridgeRoute.description: Bridge route information (src chain + token, dst chain + token, BridgeId)

requiresRegisterTransaction.description: Flag indicating whether the transaction requires registration via the registerTxs endpoint. Mandatory for non-EVM transactions.

ChainId.description: Chain ID. Find in the list of supported networks.

toExtra.description: Additional address information (e.g., memo, tag). Can be null.

usdAmount.description: USD value of the payment amount

isNative.description: Boolean flag for whether token is the chain's gas token.

logo.description: URL to the token's logo image. Can be null if logo is not available.

Address.description: Address type - can be EvmAddress, HyperCoreAddress, SolanaAddress, or AltVmAddress.

HyperCoreAddress.description: HyperCore address (0x prefix + 32 or 40 hex characters)

code.description: Error type code for programmatic handling

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the error occurred

code.description: Error type code for programmatic handling

message.example: The format of the specified address is invalid.

details.description: Additional context about the error, including invalid values and suggestions

field.description: The field that caused the error

reason.description: Explanation of why the value is invalid

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the error occurred

receiverAddress.description: EVM address to receive the fee

minAmount.description:
Minimum amount of source token for exact-out swaps. 
 `null` if no min.

maxAmount.description:
Maximum amount of source token for exact-out swaps. 
 `null` if no max.

minAmount.description:
Minimum amount of source token required for exact-in swaps. 
 `null` if no min.

maxAmount.description:
Maximum amount of source token for exact-in swaps. 
 `null` if no max.

tokens.description:
Available destination tokens for given source token 
 `all` indicates all tokens on destination chain are eligible

allOf.description: âš ï¸ This field is maintained for backwards compatibility. Use `srcToken.minAmount` and `srcToken.maxAmount` at the top level of the response instead.

srcToken.description: Source token information including amount limits

timestamp.description: Response timestamp (ISO string) for cache validation

chainId.description: Chain ID where the transaction occurred

success.description: Whether the transaction registration was successful

workflow.description: Workflow information if transaction is associated with a workflow (only present if the transaction had a workflow)

bridgeTime.description: Bridge time in seconds (null if not a bridge)

nextBridge.description: Bridge type for the next hop

value.description: Transaction value as string (may include bigint notation like '0n')

revertReason.description: Revert reason if transaction failed, null otherwise

isNative.description: Whether the token is the native gas token

usdAmount.description: USD value of the token amount

amount.description: The exact in or exact out amount of the swap

recipient.description: Address to receive the swapped tokens

to.description: The EVM address of the target contract (20 bytes hex)

erc20Amount.description: The amount of Erc20 being transferred

erc20Spender.description: The Erc20 spender requiring approval for the transaction call

userCredentials.description: User credentials object containing wallet information

newUser.description: Whether this is a newly created user (true) or existing user (false)

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when workflow was executed
Unix timestamp when workflow was executed

txHash.description: Transaction hash of the relay transaction

relayTx.description: Relay transaction details (null if not applicable)

orderType.description: Order type (FOK/FAK are market orders, GTC/GTD are limit orders)

price.description: Price per share (0-1) - required for limit orders, optional for market orders

size.description: Number of shares for limit orders

created_at.description: Unix timestamp when order was created
